tool_description:
DEMO - http://api-gsm.makingdatameaningful.com/
Mobile phone specs with images - 12,000+ models, [1994 -2024], similar with gsm arena API.
name: Mobile Phone Specs Database
title: Mobile Phone Specs Database

api_list.name: Get {Phone Image ids} by {Custom id}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-phone-images-ids-by-phone-custom-id/103693"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-phone-images-ids-by-phone-custom-id/{phonecustomid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get {Specifications} by {Brand Name} and {Model Name}
api_list.description: Get all phone specifications by brand name and model name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-specifications-by-brandname-modelname/Samsung/Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-specifications-by-brandname-modelname/{brandname}/{modelname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get {Image} by {Phone Image id}
api_list.description:
- Get Image by Id
- Paste image ID from this api "Get all phone image ids by phone custom id" and image media content is returned
- ex of image id : "Z2RjOG80Smk2WVV2R0wwR1F1RjRNZG5TR1ZqUUZuU1JhU1pNT0FjNG94UT0="
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com/gsm/get-image-by-id/Z2RjOG80Smk2WVV2R0wwR1F1RjRNZG5TR1ZqUUZuU1JhU1pNT0FjNG94UT0="

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phone-specs-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
